org.drip.param.valuation

Class CashSettleParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.param.valuation.CashSettleParams

  • public class CashSettleParams
extends Serializer
    This implementation is the place-holder for the cash settlement parameters for a given product. Contains the cash settle lag, the calendar, and the date adjustment mode.
